name: Youtube - Player Size like Cosmic Panda
description: Changes the maximzed state of the new Youtube player to 720p like in Cosmic Panda.
additional_info:
Edit width and heigth for #watch-player to change the player size.
(Remember to add 30px to the height for player controls.)

UPDATE for v1.1: This probably is a temporary fix, since the new auto quality function seems
a bit buggy at the moment. It seems to support 720p now but only if you click "maximize"
every time. This updated should keep it at 720p.
So please let me know if it works for you.

v1.1 - Updated for Youtube's new auto quality function.
v1.0 - Initial Release
